articles.description: Lori Loughlin spent two weeks in isolation ahead of her release from prison on Monday due to a COVID-19 outbreak that has already infected 185 inmates and three staffers.

articles.title: Prince Charles sparked jet row over Greta Thunberg trip before farmers' climate warning - Express
articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES sparked a row over his use of private jets to attend a conference with climate change activist Greta Thunberg, before he claimed farmers should pay for their own pollution.
